title: How the corrupt NHTSA legal counsel screwed carowners out of right to repair
description:
CREDIT FOR SHORT EDITING: @mr.grotto9498

👉 Mayer Brown represents AAI in challenging case: https://web.archive.org/web/20210615132729/https://www.reuters.com/business/legal/auto-group-goes-trial-challenge-massachusetts-vehicle-data-law-2021-06-14/

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro 
00:35 - Why was this law necessary in 2020 after the 2012 law was passed?
02:20 - Why was NHTSA's letter inappropriate?
04:02 - Judicial process & legislative process was sidestepped by NHTSA
04:48 - Manufacturer's arguments
05:18 - Car manufacturers are already doing this
06:26 - If automakers have made their cars THIS insecure, this is a problem even WITHOUT right to repair!
07:15 - Why not do this federally?
08:05 - Are NHTSA's citations made up or legitimate? 
09:20 - Would this argument have held up in court?
10:30 - Automakers already wall off portions of the car from the technicians
11:03 - "Conspiratorial thinking"
12:11 - What can normal people do about this?
14:27 - Thanks & goodbye!
